whyBengaluru.title: Why Bengaluru is a Magnet for Foreign Companies
whyBengaluru.text1: Bengaluru’s industrial sector, contributing ~30% to Karnataka’s GDP, is projected to grow 8-10% annually through 2025. With
whyBengaluru.text2: , the city attracts global giants like Apple and Adobe, leveraging its skilled workforce and robust infrastructure.
whyBengaluru.bullet1: Skilled Workforce: 12% growth in 2024, ideal for manufacturing and logistics.
whyBengaluru.bullet2: FDI Surge: $10 billion in 2024, up 20% from 2023, fueling industrial expansion.
whyBengaluru.bullet3: Ease of Doing Business: Karnataka ranks #1 in India, with streamlined approvals.
whyBengaluru.bullet4: Strategic Hubs: Bommasandra, Jigani, and Hoskote offer cost-effective industrial spaces.

tariffs.title: Navigating Trump’s Tariffs: Opportunities for Bengaluru
tariffs.text1: Trump’s 26% tariffs on Indian goods (effective April 2025) are lower than China’s 54% and Vietnam’s 46%, making
tariffs.text2: a competitive choice. Tariff exemptions on electronics make Indian exports 20% cheaper, driving $5-7 billion in new investments.

seo.title: Find 50,000+ Sq Ft Warehouse or Office for Lease in Bengaluru 2025
seo.description: Discover how to lease a 50,000+ sq ft grade A warehouse or office in Bengaluru’s top hubs like Nelamangala and Bommasandra. Get expert tips for 2025!
seo.keywords: 50,000 sq ft warehouse for lease Bengaluru 2025, grade A warehouse Bengaluru, large office space for rent Bengaluru, best locations for large warehouses Bengaluru

largeWarehouseOfficeBengaluru.title: How to Find the Perfect 50,000+ Sq Ft Grade A Warehouse or Office Space for Lease in Bengaluru’s Top Industrial Hubs (2025 Guide)

intro.text1: Bengaluru’s commercial real estate market is booming, with soaring demand for large-scale warehouses and offices exceeding 50,000 sq ft.
intro.text2: are driving this growth, seeking grade A spaces in strategic locations. This guide helps tenants and owners navigate key considerations for leasing or buying in 2025.

location.title: Choosing the Right Location
location.text1: Location is critical when selecting a 50,000+ sq ft property. Bengaluru’s industrial hubs offer excellent connectivity and infrastructure.
location.highlight1: Nelamangala, Bommasandra, Hoskote, Doddaballapura, and Devanahalli
location.text2: are top choices due to their proximity to highways and airports.

area1.title: Nelamangala
area1.text: Located along NH-48, ideal for logistics with access to Mumbai and Chennai ports.

area2.title: Bommasandra
area2.text: Close to Electronic City, perfect for tech firms needing large offices or warehouses.

area3.title: Hoskote
area3.text: Emerging hub near NH-44, favored by e-commerce for large distribution centers.

area4.title: Doddaballapura
area4.text: Situated along NH-207, known for its textile and manufacturing industries, offering cost-effective land for large-scale industrial setups.

area5.title: Devanahalli
area5.text: Near Kempegowda International Airport and NH-44, a prime location for aerospace, logistics, and high-tech industries with excellent global connectivity.

features.title: Must-Have Features for Grade A Spaces
features.text1: Large-scale properties require advanced infrastructure to meet modern business needs.
features.text2: offer features that enhance efficiency and compliance.
features.bullet1: Pre-engineered buildings (PEB) with high ceilings and G+5 racking.
features.bullet2: High dock-to-area ratios for efficient loading/unloading.
features.bullet3: Fire safety systems and environmental compliance.

cost.title: Understanding Costs
cost.text1: Leasing a 50,000+ sq ft property involves significant investment.
cost.highlight1: Rental rates in Nelamangala range from ₹16–24/sq ft
cost.text2: , while Bommasandra may command higher rates. Buying offers long-term ROI but requires careful financial planning.

scalability.title: Scalability and Built-to-Suit Options
scalability.text1: Businesses need spaces that grow with them.
scalability.text2: allow customization for specific operational needs.

enoshInfra.text2: ensures tailored solutions. Learn more about
enoshInfra.linkText: why Bengaluru is an industrial hub
enoshInfra.text3: and partner with us for your next big move.

conclusion.title: Conclusion
conclusion.text1: Finding the perfect 50,000+ sq ft warehouse or office in Bengaluru requires strategic planning.
conclusion.highlight1: Enosh Infra is your trusted partner
conclusion.text2: in navigating this dynamic market for 2025 and beyond.
